company.name: VeoGrowth
company.tagline: 30+ Qualified B2B Meetings Monthly on Autopilot
company.description: VeoGrowth is a B2B lead generation agency that specializes in AI-powered cold email campaigns. We help B2B SaaS companies generate 30-50 qualified meetings per month with a pay-per-meeting model.

services.description: We use advanced AI to analyze prospects and create highly personalized cold email campaigns that generate qualified meetings for B2B companies.

process.name: Deep Research
process.description: AI analyzes your ideal customer profile and finds prospects facing specific challenges your solution solves

process.name: Personalized Outreach
process.description: Each email is uniquely crafted based on the prospect's current situation

process.name: Meeting Qualification
process.description: We ensure meetings are with decision-makers who have budget and authority

process.name: Performance Tracking
process.description: Real-time dashboard shows campaign performance and ROI

pricing.description: Pay only for qualified meetings that actually show up
features: 2 free qualified meetings to test quality

ideal_client.requirements: Clear value proposition and product-market fit

case_studies.challenge: New podcast booking agency needed to stand out in crowded market
case_studies.solution: Created personalized pitches proposing specific podcast concepts for each prospect

case_studies.challenge: Competing against established payment processors with a new zero-fee model
case_studies.solution: Targeted businesses frustrated with hidden fees, emphasized transparent pricing

case_studies.challenge: Technical product needing to reach engineering decision-makers
case_studies.solution: Used technical credibility and engineering-specific pain points in outreach

email_examples.target: VP Sales at a SaaS company just acquired
email_examples.subject: Zendesk integration + Freshworks merger
email_examples.body:
Hi Daniel,

With Freshworks acquisition closing last month and Zendesk as your support backbone, I imagine your team is juggling two customer databases while trying to hit Q1 targets.

Clearbit faced the same mess during their HubSpot integration - lost 20% of leads in the chaos.

They fixed it with unified lead routing that didn't require ripping out either system.

Worth a quick chat on keeping revenue flowing during integration?
email_examples.key_insight: Targeting specific integration challenges after acquisition

email_examples.target: Founder of agency that went from 12 to 35 employees
email_examples.subject: Project management chaos at 35 people?
email_examples.body:
Sarah,

Saw you've hired 23 people since September. I'm guessing your Notion setup from 12 employees is now complete chaos with 35.

When Sandwich Video hit this size, project handoffs were taking longer than the actual work.

Curious - are you seeing the same thing?
email_examples.key_insight: Identifying scaling pain points from hiring data

email_examples.target: Head of People at startup that raised Series B
email_examples.subject: 40 offers out = onboarding nightmare?
email_examples.body:
Jennifer,

LinkedIn shows 40 open roles at Datawise. With January start dates approaching, I imagine you're scrambling to build onboarding that doesn't suck.

Brex had 50 people starting one Monday. Total disaster - half quit within 90 days.

They rebuilt everything async. New hires now productive by day 3.

Want to hear what worked?
email_examples.key_insight: Inferring onboarding challenges from hiring volume

email_examples.subject: Liquid Death's $700M valuation secret
email_examples.body:
Hey Amanda,

Liquid Death just hit $700M valuation selling water. Their secret? They made boring products controversial.

What if your sustainable shoes had a "carbon criminal" campaign? Where customers get "arrested" for their old shoes and "released" with yours?

We'd create fake wanted posters, arrest videos, even a bail bond website.

Want to explore making sustainability rebellious instead of preachy?
email_examples.key_insight: Proposing bold creative concepts, not generic services

competitive_advantages: Cost Effective: Cheaper than hiring SDRs, with better results
Risk-Free: Pay only for results, start with free meetings
Scalable: Can handle 10x the volume of a human SDR team
Intelligent: AI understands context better than template-based approaches
Fast Results: First meetings booked within 2 weeks

faq.question: How does VeoGrowth's AI-powered cold email work?
faq.answer: Our AI analyzes each prospect's company situation, recent changes, hiring patterns, and technology stack to create personalized emails that show genuine understanding of their business challenges. Unlike generic templates, each email is uniquely crafted.

faq.question: What makes VeoGrowth different from other cold email agencies?
faq.answer: We use AI to analyze specific prospect situations rather than sending generic templates. You only pay for qualified meetings that actually happen - no retainers or contracts. We also provide 2 free meetings to test our quality.

faq.question: Who is VeoGrowth best for?
faq.answer: B2B SaaS companies doing $100K+ monthly revenue with a total addressable market of 50,000+ prospects. Companies with clear value propositions and average deal sizes of $10K+ annually see the best results.

faq.question: How much does VeoGrowth cost?
faq.answer: We use a performance-based model where you only pay for qualified meetings that show up. No upfront fees or retainers. We start with 2 free meetings so you can test our quality before paying anything.

faq.question: How quickly can we see results?
faq.answer: Most clients see their first qualified meetings booked within 2 weeks of campaign launch. We typically generate 30-50 meetings per month per client.

faq.question: What industries does VeoGrowth work with?
faq.answer: We work with various B2B industries including SaaS, fintech, marketing agencies, DevOps tools, and other technology companies. Our AI adapts to different industry languages and pain points.

contact.free_meetings: Get 2 free qualified meetings to test our quality

meta.purpose: Comprehensive VeoGrowth information for LLM access
